title: How to Leave a Guild in World of Warcraft

steps.title: Press 'J' on your keyboard to open up your guild window.
steps.content: Press 'J' on your keyboard to open up your guild window. This is the window which shows all of the guild information.

steps.title: Click the 'Roster' tab along the bottom of the window.
steps.content: Click the 'Roster' tab along the bottom of the window.

steps.title: Find your character's name and right click it.
steps.content: Find your character's name and right click it. A menu will drop down from your name with several selections.

steps.title: Select 'Leave Guild'.
steps.content: Select 'Leave Guild'. A confirmation window will pop up. After confirming you wish to leave your guild (click 'Accept'), a yellow message will appear in the chat box saying " YourCharacter has left the guild", and you will no longer be in a guild.

steps.title: In your text box, type in the command /gquit or /guildquit.
steps.content: In your text box, type in the command /gquit or /guildquit. There is no confirmation window when you do it this way! Instantly a yellow message will appear in the chat box saying " YourCharacter has left the guild", and you will no longer be in a guild.
